EmailTemplate.subject: 2 Days Only To Get 2x Bonus Points

View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>

To Double Up and Save Your time is running out! Points in our Bonus Points Centre have been doubled for a limited time.
1 POINT = $1
Take advantage on or before October 11th, 2018 at 24:00 EDT. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRPOINTSOCT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Some of the items we've handpicked for you: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/1961058_Expo_2-in-1_Dry-Erase_Markers_Chisel-Tip.aspx?cmp=EBGROCT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 4 Point

*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
